sub_title: Company Formation in the Netherlands, identify and register UBO at Dutch chamber of commerce, KVK
summary:
WHAT I DO:
I help foreign business owners establish their business (no matter what stage they are at) in the Netherlands. We provide one stop service including company formation, registered office, opening a bank account, company secretarial services, payroll, accounting and taxation.

I help business owners and directors to identify and register UBO at KVK following the Amended Act on the Prevention of Money Laundering and Financing of Terrorism (Dutch AML Act) was entered into effect on 25 July 2018. 

WHO I WORK WITH:
I have worked with clients from different sizes, in different sectors and located from all over the world. Some of those companies setting up a Dutch company for the purpose of selling their products or services to B2B or B2C. Some of those setting up a Dutch company for the benefit of Dutch tax treaties. My clients, to name but a few, from various industries such as food, retail market, design, solar industry, IT consultancy and mining. 

WHY IT MATTERS
We are different to others because we are extremely good at what we are doing, we are professional, we have comprehensive experience and knowledge, we connect our clients with valuable contacts and networks,  we see only solutions not problems, we understand culture difference, we walk extra miles.  Our aim is to help our clients to be successful in the Netherlands.
